attributes.action: end the production of the 1p & 2p copper coins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The production of the 1p & 2p coins cannot be cost effective any longer and is therefore a waste of both time and money.
It is difficult to find anything which costs either 1p or 2p in shops now, so these coins won't really be missed.
There would not be a general 'price increse' as was the case when the old halp-penny was scrapped as items were rounded up in price, quite the opposite in fact, as instead of costing £xx.99 things would then cost £xx.95

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
